artist: Artist: Miguel Martinez-Joffre , et al.; Publisher: Monkeysuit Press, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, full bleed, photomechanic image of a figure wearing a monkey suit walking through the forest printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 128 pp.
inscription: P. 3, black ink pen: (drawings and signitures from all contributing artists)
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: In Search of Monkeysuit, vol. 4
